content:
•1.2GHz processor
•3.7-inch 800 x 480 capacitive display
•Quad-band GSM/GPRS/EDGE
•Tri-band UMTS/HSPA
•5-megapixel camera with 720p video recording
•8GB eMMC (storage for apps and data), 512MB of RAM
•microSD slot
•Magnetometer
•Proximity sensor
•Accelerometer
•Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR
•2.4GHz b/g/n and 5GHz a/n Wi-Fi + UMA
•3G Mobile hotspot
•Optical trackpad
•1230 mAh battery
•BlackBerry OS 6.1
•OpenGL ES 2.0
http://www.bgr.com/2011/01/14/exclusive-blackberry-storm-3-shows-up-tells-all/
http://www.gsmarena.com/blackberry_storm_3_breaks_cover_full_specs_unleashed-news-2227.php
http://www.gsmarena.com/blackberry_storm3-3529.php
author: TUPLI

content:
Večina pravi da je RIM pozen z novimi "osveženimi" aparati..

Kolikor jih jaz poznam so blili vedno med "poznejšimi", amapk vsi teli aparati (katerih specifikacije vidimo zadnje dni), so solidni na papirju. Upajmo da bo OS6.1 še malo bolj dodelan in da probajo ponovno razburkati mobilno sceno.
author: undefined
